thread.section_title: www.arguscarhire.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of www.arguscarhire.com | www.arguscarhire.com
thread.title: Ashley Morgan

author: Ashley Morgan
title: Ashley Morgan
text: My sister and brother-in-law from Germany and I were very impressed with the informed, efficient and friendly service we received, as well as the advice of choice of car, in the range we had selected, for our needs. My brother-in-law (Horst) is very tall, and the lady at the desk advised on the Honda which was correct because Horst never bumped his head.
